title: Championship Skins
body:
So I have heard two different things concerning this skin.

That will most likely/definitely come back some time in 2015 because they are Legacy skins. - 2 different league forums. , all Senior Members

That is was available temporarily and will never be available for purchase again because they Champion skins (apparently different from Legacy). - LoL wiki and LoL Support page

Was wondering if anyone knew anything thing about the champion skins, inside information or if there was anything I can do I y end to attain or figure out more.

Sorry if this is a dumb question.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Thresh and Shyvana are temporarily available in the store during and after Finals since they're legacy. Championship Riven is limited, and hasn't been re-released since Season II when she came out. There is possibility that she may return in the future.

Thresh and Shyvana are Legacy skins and they come back every year. So yes, they will return later this year.

Riven is a Limited Edition skin, said to not be re-released till at least 2016.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944-Guide-to-Legacy-and-Limited-Skins

1000000% support that CS riven should not be re-released, If anyone can randomly grab hold of this skin then whats the point of me having actually got it from going to like PAX and WORLDS, if you re-release CS riven you mid as well re-release human ryze, rusty blitz urfwick black ali silver kayle...... See where im going with this, Ya you'd be able to defeat the purpose of people who RWT to get such things, but you'd also be devalueing something that we have as "Veteran" players. Granted Riots now 95% more about the money then they ever were and I do see this eventually happening as a marketing and budget thing..... But please for the sake of the game and players who actually like to have something that shows off the time and effort we put into this game... If you re-release CS riven and all the other I mentioned Why not just release all the victorious skins... Make me feel worthless for getting gold in season 1 for my strain to grind to gold back then.... This completely is a big F you to myself and any other veteran player... Don't you want the new players to be like "hey man I never seen that skin!!!" and "Man if they got that skin or Icon from back then and its so rare and cool now and were only able to get it from having it back then!! man I hope in a few years I have something cool you could only get once!!" Get my rant/argument?

This is a topic that I feel somewhat conflicted about. I find the idea of some skins being available for one time only and never sold again interesting. You can see the person with the skin and admire it in all its limited glory. The only problem I have with Championship Riven not being released again is that they re-released Championship Thresh. If the Championship skin was only available for that one season and then never again I could understand that they wouldn't want to re-release Championship Riven. Since Championship Thresh was re-released though, I find it a bit silly that they would make Riven's impossible to obtain. That's just my personal opinion. And if you're willing to quit a game because a skin is re-released that's just childish.
